pages.text: Mechanical Saws, when placed upright, will process logs into stripped logs and stripped logs into planks. It is not as efficient as the $(l:electic_machines/sawmill)Sawmill$(), but it gets the job done.$(br)$(italics)Note: there is an alternate recipe available, since the Sawblade doesn't stack.

When placed sideways and provided rotational force, a Mechanical Saw will completely chop down trees in front of it. On $(l:kinetic_machines/contraptieons)Contraptions$(), they will chop down trees the contraption runs into, and store the drops in attached inventories. $(ponder)
